The Psalter or boke of Psalmes both in Latyn and Englyshe. wyth a kalender, & a table the more eassyer and lyghtlyer to fynde the psalmes contayned therin. Bible. O.T. Psalms. Latin. Vulgate. Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.
[8], cxxviii leaves : ill.
Ricardus grafton excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum, [London] : M.D.xl. [1540]
Translated from Latin by Miles Coverdale. English and Latin in parallel columns. Signatures: a-q. With an additional title page on a1, lacking the date: The Psalter or booke of Psalmes both in Latyne and Englyshe. Translated into Englyshe out of the como[n] texte in Latyne, which customably is redde in the churche. Printed in red and black throughout. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The Psalter or boke of Psalmes both in Latyn and Englyshe. wyth a kalender, & a table the more eassyer and lyghtlyer to fynde the psalmes contayned therin. Bible. O.T. Psalms. Latin. Vulgate. Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.
[8], cxxviii leaves : ill.
Ricardus grafton excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum, [London] : M.D.xl. [1540]
Translated from Latin by Miles Coverdale. English and Latin in parallel columns. Signatures: a-q. With an additional title page on a1, lacking the date: The Psalter or booke of Psalmes both in Latyne and Englyshe. Translated into Englyshe out of the como[n] texte in Latyne, which customably is redde in the churche. Printed in red and black throughout. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
